title: Diamond Robe
summaries: The Diamond Robe is an armor item that can be worn in the shirt slot. It is part of the Wizard set and is the strongest type of gem robe.

Wearing the <linked>Wizard Hat</linked> alongside the Diamond Robe provides a set bonus of +10% magic <linked>critical strike chance</linked>, whereas wearing a <linked>Magic Hat</linked> alongside it provides a set bonus of +60 <linked>mana</linked>. Any leg-slot equipment can be worn with these set bonuses remaining intact.
